Instantiate the object with microscopic results choosen by the toolkit practitioner.

This choice is defined in model, which can chosen among the following choices: ‚Äò1981-VAR-AM-FP‚Äô, ‚Äò1998-VAR-AM-APR‚Äô, ‚Äò1998-VAR-AM-iAPR‚Äô, ‚Äò2006-BHF-AM*‚Äô, ‚Äò2008-BCS-NM‚Äô, ‚Äò2008-AFDMC-NM‚Äô, ‚Äò2008-QMC-NM-swave‚Äô, ‚Äò2010-QMC-NM-AV4‚Äô, ‚Äò2009-DLQMC-NM‚Äô, ‚Äò2010-MBPT-NM‚Äô, ‚Äò2012-AFDMC-NM-1‚Äô, ‚Äò2012-AFDMC-NM-2‚Äô, ‚Äò2012-AFDMC-NM-3‚Äô, ‚Äò2012-AFDMC-NM-4‚Äô, ‚Äò2012-AFDMC-NM-5‚Äô, ‚Äò2012-AFDMC-NM-6‚Äô, ‚Äò2012-AFDMC-NM-7‚Äô, ‚Äò2013-QMC-NM‚Äô, ‚Äò2014-AFQMC-NM‚Äô, ‚Äò2016-QMC-NM‚Äô, ‚Äò2016-MBPT-AM‚Äô, ‚Äò2018-QMC-NM‚Äô, ‚Äò2019-MBPT-AM-L59‚Äô, ‚Äò2019-MBPT-AM-L69‚Äô, ‚Äò2020-MBPT-AM‚Äô, ‚Äò2022-AFDMC-NM‚Äô, ‚Äò2024-NLEFT-AM‚Äô, ‚Äò2024-BHF-AM-2BF-Av8p‚Äô, ‚Äò2024-BHF-AM-2BF-Av18‚Äô, ‚Äò2024-BHF-AM-2BF-BONN‚Äô, ‚Äò2024-BHF-AM-2BF-CDBONN‚Äô, ‚Äò2024-BHF-AM-2BF-NSC97a‚Äô, ‚Äò2024-BHF-AM-2BF-NSC97b‚Äô, ‚Äò2024-BHF-AM-2BF-NSC97c‚Äô, ‚Äò2024-BHF-AM-2BF-NSC97d‚Äô, ‚Äò2024-BHF-AM-2BF-NSC97e‚Äô, ‚Äò2024-BHF-AM-2BF-NSC97f‚Äô, ‚Äò2024-BHF-AM-2BF-SSCV14‚Äô, ‚Äò2024-BHF-AM-23BF-Av8p‚Äô, ‚Äò2024-BHF-AM-23BF-Av18‚Äô, ‚Äò2024-BHF-AM-23BF-BONN‚Äô, ‚Äò2024-BHF-AM-23BF-CDBONN‚Äô, ‚Äò2024-BHF-AM-23BF-NSC97a‚Äô, ‚Äò2024-BHF-AM-23BF-NSC97b‚Äô, ‚Äò2024-BHF-AM-23BF-NSC97c‚Äô, ‚Äò2024-BHF-AM-23BF-NSC97d‚Äô, ‚Äò2024-BHF-AM-23BF-NSC97e‚Äô, ‚Äò2024-BHF-AM-23BF-NSC97f‚Äô, ‚Äò2024-BHF-AM-23BF-SSCV14‚Äô

Parameters

nucleardatapy.setup_micro_matter.models_micro_matter()[source]ÔÉÅ

Return a list with the name of the models available in this toolkit and print them all on the prompt. These models are the following ones: ‚Äò1981-VAR-AM-FP‚Äô, ‚Äò1998-VAR-AM-APR‚Äô, ‚Äò1998-VAR-AM-APRfit‚Äô, ‚Äò2006-BHF-AM*‚Äô, ‚Äò2008-BCS-NM‚Äô, ‚Äò2008-AFDMC-NM‚Äô, ‚Äò2012-AFDMC-NM-1‚Äô, ‚Äò2012-AFDMC-NM-2‚Äô, ‚Äò2012-AFDMC-NM-3‚Äô, ‚Äò2012-AFDMC-NM-4‚Äô, ‚Äò2012-AFDMC-NM-5‚Äô, ‚Äò2012-AFDMC-NM-6‚Äô, ‚Äò2012-AFDMC-NM-7‚Äô, ‚Äò2008-QMC-NM-swave‚Äô, ‚Äò2010-QMC-NM-AV4‚Äô, ‚Äò2009-DLQMC-NM‚Äô, ‚Äò2010-MBPT-NM‚Äô, ‚Äò2013-QMC-NM‚Äô, ‚Äò2014-AFQMC-NM‚Äô, ‚Äò2016-QMC-NM‚Äô, ‚Äò2016-MBPT-AM‚Äô, ‚Äò2018-QMC-NM‚Äô, ‚Äò2019-MBPT-AM-L59‚Äô, ‚Äò2019-MBPT-AM-L69‚Äô, ‚Äò2020-MBPT-AM‚Äô, ‚Äò2022-AFDMC-NM‚Äô, ‚Äò2024-NLEFT-AM‚Äô, ‚Äò2024-BHF-AM-2BF-Av8p‚Äô, ‚Äò2024-BHF-AM-2BF-Av18‚Äô, ‚Äò2024-BHF-AM-2BF-BONN‚Äô, ‚Äò2024-BHF-AM-2BF-CDBONN‚Äô, ‚Äò2024-BHF-AM-2BF-NSC97a‚Äô, ‚Äò2024-BHF-AM-2BF-NSC97b‚Äô, ‚Äò2024-BHF-AM-2BF-NSC97c‚Äô, ‚Äò2024-BHF-AM-2BF-NSC97d‚Äô, ‚Äò2024-BHF-AM-2BF-NSC97e‚Äô, ‚Äò2024-BHF-AM-2BF-NSC97f‚Äô, ‚Äò2024-BHF-AM-2BF-SSCV14‚Äô, ‚Äò2024-BHF-AM-23BF-Av8p‚Äô, ‚Äò2024-BHF-AM-23BF-Av18‚Äô, ‚Äò2024-BHF-AM-23BF-BONN‚Äô, ‚Äò2024-BHF-AM-23BF-CDBONN‚Äô, ‚Äò2024-BHF-AM-23BF-NSC97a‚Äô, ‚Äò2024-BHF-AM-23BF-NSC97b‚Äô, ‚Äò2024-BHF-AM-23BF-NSC97c‚Äô, ‚Äò2024-BHF-AM-23BF-NSC97d‚Äô, ‚Äò2024-BHF-AM-23BF-NSC97e‚Äô, ‚Äò2024-BHF-AM-23BF-NSC97f‚Äô, ‚Äò2024-BHF-AM-23BF-SSCV14‚Äô, ‚Äò2024-BHF-AM-23BFmicro-Av18‚Äô, ‚Äò2024-BHF-AM-23BFmicro-BONNB‚Äô, ‚Äò2024-BHF-AM-23BFmicro-NSC93‚Äô :return: The list of models. :rtype: list[str].
